sense.def:
To hypnotizes someone
pomeni nekoga spraviti v stanje, v katerem navidezno spi, vendar se lahko odziva na tisto, kar mu rečemo.

seg.quote: I was able to hypnotize him into doing things against his own will.

sense.def:
To be hypnotized by something
pomeni biti tako očaran z nečim, da nam prežene misli na vse drugo.

seg.quote: The child was hypnotized by the machine.
